name: Transatlantic Ships Sim
description:
Includes three ships to sail:

1. Transatlantic ship
2. Cargo ship
3. Cruise ship

Sail in an archipelago, offers two camera views, over the ship and a drone style external view to fly around the ship.

Also features an open sea sailing and a ship sinking simulation.

Additionally offers 3 climate environments:

1. Snowing
2. Raining
3. Sunny
